0100001101100100 0001100110011111 1 -> sum: 0101110100000100, cout: 0
0110001100111000 0010101010111000 0 -> sum: 1000110111110000, cout: 0
1010111110100111 1000010011100011 0 -> sum: 0011010010001010, cout: 1
0110101110001100 1000100000010101 0 -> sum: 1111001110100001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
